message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $12000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $15000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to help you get the most out of it. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
